body_html: Not sure if it's a good idea, but what do you think about dispatching a CPU kernel if the size of the permutation is smaller than say 10000? Magma in some cases perform operations on the CPU as well depending on the input size.
body_text: Not sure if it's a good idea, but what do you think about dispatching a CPU kernel if the size of the permutation is smaller than say 10000? Magma in some cases perform operations on the CPU as well depending on the input size.
body: Not sure if it's a good idea, but what do you think about dispatching a CPU kernel if the size of the permutation is smaller than say 10000? Magma in some cases perform operations on the CPU as well depending on the input size.
